MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to safely remove trees on our overhead lines and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:00am on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
